title: This function deserializes Kafka events using schema in AWS Glue Schema Registry
description: AWS Lambda function that deserializes events in a Kafka topic using Avro schema in AWS Glue Schema Registry.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This code example shows how an AWS Lambda function can get invoked by Event Source Mapping to a Kafka topic. It downloads the corresponding schema from AWS Glue Schema Registry by looking up the schema version (by which the record has been serialized). The deserializes record is stored in JSON format in Amazon S3.

codeTabs.title: Copy the code into your lambda function
codeTabs.description: Follow the AWS Lambda instructions for packaging with dependencies, and uploading in .zip format.
